name: Apple iPhone 13
description: The iPhone 13 features a new A15 Bionic chip, an OLED display, 128GB of internal storage, and compatibility with all 5G networks.

name: Google Pixel 6
description: It features the Google Tensor CPU, 8GB of RAM, and a rear camera with both 50 megapixels for its main wide-angle and 12 megapixels for its ultrawide.

name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro
description: The 13 Pro has a physically larger camera sensor compared to prior models that allows its main 12-megapixel camera to gather more light and produce better-quality images.

name: Asus Zenfone 8
description: For small-phone Android fans, the Asus Zenfone 8 is the perfect fit. It has a relatively tiny 5.9-inch display, 8GB of RAM, 128GB of storage

name: Samsung Galaxy Note 20 Ultra
description: The Galaxy Note 20 Ultra is one of Samsung’s top-tier non-folding phones, and it has excellent battery life.The Note 20 Ultra is a high-end phone in every other respect.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 3
description: Samsung’s Galaxy Z Flip 3 is a foldable phone with a non-foldable price tag. The unique, water-resistant device comes with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 888 processor and 120Hz display, as well as 5G support.

name: TCL 20S
description: A $250 phone can be a delight to use, too. This TCL 20S has a bright 6.67-inch 1080p screen, 128GB storage, and a 5,000mAh battery.

name: Google Pixel 5A
description: You won’t find any bells and whistles like a big, fast refresh rate screen, but the Pixel 5A does the basics very well with IP67 water resistance, a great camera, and timely software updates.

name: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 3
description: The Galaxy Z Fold 3 is Samsung’s latest attempt at making foldable phones more mainstream. It’s expensive, sure, but it’s also more durable than previous models

name: Xiaomi Poco F3
description: The Poco F3 is one of the hottest surprises this season. It's a proper flagship-killer, the catchy name behind all those overqualified mid-ranges.
